title: Why didn't I get a chest?
body: Hello to whoever is reading this, whether it it is broporos or porocles, i need help, i just got an S+ on Azir (you can check if you dont believe me) and i didnt get a chest, i have 3 chests that i can get so i didn't run out, and I didnt get one, if you can please explain why this is happening that would help a lot thank you :)

replies.body:
oh thank you so much for answering, i totally forgot that i was queuing with my friend, and he got an S that game so thank you again for that P.S. ur my favorite mod
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

It looks like you've already received a chest for Azir this season!  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can only earn a chest once per season for a champion.  Let me know if that clears things up!
You can only get one chest per champion per season!
